title: 建筑地图——Carrier Strike Group 2030 [1.5:1 Scale]航母战斗群2030[1.5:1比例]|...
author: xiaopangju
txt_content:
本帖最后由 冰川橘子 于 2020-1-3 20:30 编辑 

[Carrier Strike Group 2030 [1.5:1 Scale] - 航母战斗群2030[1.5:1比例] ]
 作者原文：
[size=2.25]Carrier Strike Group 10:

[size=0.875]Carrier Strike Group 10, abbreviated as CSG-10 or CARSTRKGRU 10, is a U.S. Navy carrier strike group. Carrier strike groups gain and maintain sea control as well as project naval airpower ashore.

[size=0.875]The aircraft carrier USS Enterprise (CVN-80) is the strike group's current flagship, and as of 2030, other units assigned to the group include Carrier Air Wing Three embarked on board Enterprise, the Ticonderoga-class cruiser Chosin, and Destroyer Squadron 26.

[size=0.875]In creating a realistic carrier strike group around a Gerald R. Ford class carrier, in particular the Enterprise which is not expected to be commissioned until 2027, I sought to update the strike group accordingly. Choosing more modern destroyers and submarines and exchanging the air group's single seat F/A-18E's for F-35C's, While keeping the air wings complement of two seat F/A-18F's for their greater combat capability.

In addition I chose for the first time to build at 1.5:1 scale, affording far more detail but also greatly expanding the work load of the project. In the end I was able to produce five unique vessels with the two Virginia class subs being the only identical ships. 

译文：
航母打击组10：
航母战斗群10，简称CSG-10或Carstrkgru 10，是美国海军航母战斗群。航母打击集团获得并维持海上控制权，并在岸上部署海军空军。
航母USS Enterprise（CVN-80）是打击集群目前的旗舰，到2030年，分配给该集团的其他部队包括航母三号机上企业、提康德罗加级巡洋舰Chosin和驱逐舰中队26。
在围绕杰拉尔德·R·福特（Gerald R.Ford）级航母创建一个现实的航母打击小组时，特别是在2027年之前预计不会进行试运行的企业，我试图相应地更新打击小组。选择更现代化的驱逐舰和潜艇，并将空军的单座F/A-18E换成F-35C，同时保持两座F/A-18F的机翼配合，以增强其作战能力。
此外，我第一次选择了1.5:1的规模，提供了更多的细节，但也大大扩大了项目的工作量。最后，我制作了五艘独特的船只，只有两艘弗吉尼亚级潜艇是唯一相同的船只。

 [ Install - 地图安装 ]
Save存档(正版用户):
1、关闭Minecraft，
2、在Windows资源管理器的路径中输入 %appdata%/.minecraft 。
3、把下载的地图存档解压缩放到. minecraft\saves 文件夹里面。

Schematics存档：
这类型需要MCEdit。
1、下载完成后解压，
2、关闭Minecraft，
3、打开MCEdit.exe，点击下方import按钮，选择你下载的文件，
     最后点import，按Ctrl+s保存，Ctrl+w关掉存档，点Quit退出。

- 本地图请使用第一种"Save存档(正版用户)"方法安装使用 -
